description: Notifies Amazon ECR that you intend to upload an image layer. When an image is pushed, the InitiateLayerUpload API is called once per image layer that has not already been uploaded. Whether or not an image layer has been uploaded is determined by the BatchCheckLayerAvailability API action.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository to which you intend to upload layers.

nested_items.name: uploadId
nested_items.description: The upload ID for the layer upload. This parameter is passed to further  UploadLayerPart and  CompleteLayerUpload operations.

nested_items.name: partSize
nested_items.description: The size, in bytes, that Amazon ECR expects future layer part uploads to be.
